TopicTitle: Platform Enigma- an off topic chat thread.

Articles.Content: Rage097 walked into room, his legs audibly squeeking and whirring as he passed the others. He reached the corner of the room and turned away from it. His eyes flickered and his joints sparked until he sat down and stared at the ground.

Excuse me...

*bashes ROFLcopters head in*

Thank you.

Not that we don't love you, RoflCopteo, but you do tend to dwell on ideas long, looong past their expiration date.

Not that we don't love you, RoflCopteo, but you do tend to dwell on ideas long, looong past their expiration date.

That's why I'm here!

No, it didn't.

Prove it.

*picks up blood-stained rebar.*

Don't make me do this ROFLcopter.

*picks up blood-stained rebar.*

Don't make me do this ROFLcopter.

*picks up assult rife from mass effect*

Are you sure? Are you suuurue?

*picks up assult rife from mass effect*

Are you sure? Are you suuurue?

Yes. Because this isn't mass effect.

*the assault rifle unravels into oblivion*

*begins to beat down ROFLcopter*
Nop! *escapes through the Charon Relay*

*stands still and bends the rebar by clenching my fist*

One of these days...

THis nonsense again?

Don't make me roar through with a B24J Liberator and unload full arsenal.
But.. But... I invented the Mass Relay using heaps of superconductors, magnets, dark and negative energy!

don't worry, I got this.

*mass force choke to everyone*

THis nonsense again?

Don't make me roar through with a B24J Liberator and unload full arsenal.

Unload the powah of the arsenal on that enemy B-4 ROFLcopter

don't worry, I got this.

*mass force choke to everyone*

You're choking trekkette btw. And I do not breathe, so choking is most ineffective.

don't worry, I got this.

*mass force choke to everyone*

That was horrible, mixing Mass Effect and Star wars.

Unload the powah of the arsenal on that enemy B-4 ROFLcopter

That's it. [rant:level=9001]

Star Trek is just a shameless rip-off of Star Wars.

The only reason there was an uproar about the ending of Mass Effect 3 because the players loved it so much they felt that they needed a proper ending to the game.

And Bioware actually caring for the fans, they created a DLC to fix the ending.

[/rant]

The rant may be over, but I still have more things to go on about.

That was horrible, mixing Mass Effect and Star wars.

That's it. [rant:level=9001]

Star Trek is just a shameless rip-off of Star Wars.

The only reason there was an uproar about the ending of Mass Effect 3 because the players loved it so much they felt that they needed a proper ending to the game.

And Bioware actually caring for the fans, they created a DLC to fix the ending.

[/rant]

The rant may be over, but I still have more things to go on about.

...[WARNING: ALL ATTACK SYSTEMS GO.][ÃŽâ€V CACULATION COMPLETE]

*eyes glow red, legs shift to thrusters, arms turn to chain guns and singes the floor around me*

Must you guys constantly attack each other?

It's just gotten downright silly again.

If there's nothing to talk about at the moment, go do other things instead of spamming it up.

Um, not to quibble, but STAR TREK CAME FIRST. 1966-1969. Ended... two weeks before the moon landing, if I remember correctly. Thus, Star Wars is the johnny come lately, and only succeeded because it was a special effects wunderkind.

Star Trek's original series explored new territory, taking issues of the day (like, say the VEITNAM WAR) and explored its facets allegorically. Star Wars had the erstwhile hero mackin' on his TWIN SISTER.

Edited May 28, 2013 by Trekkette
I can't type after midnight, apparently

Um, not to quibble, but STAR TREK CAME FIRST. 1966-1969. Ended... two weeks before the moon landing, if I remember correctly. Thus, Star Wars is the johnny come lately, and only succeeded because it was a special effects wunderkind.

SHH! No-one knows that!

*beats ROFLcopter over the head with my rebar*

*drags his unconscious body away to be dealt with permanently*

You're choking trekkette btw. And I do not breathe, so choking is most ineffective.

Oh yeah I forgot, you're just a tamed manifestation of human rage from 97 people.

*beats ROFLcopter over the head with my rebar*

*drags his unconscious body away to be dealt with permanently*

Can I help? I have a bathtub that claims to be acid-resistant...
But I escaped through the Charon Relay! I'm in the Serpent Nebula right now!

*beats ROFLcopter over the head with my rebar*

*drags his unconscious body away to be dealt with permanently*

PETA will sue your soul down because of animal cruelty for beating a cat.

Oh yeah I forgot, you're just a tamed manifestation of human rage from 97 people.

Exactly, except the rage is stored in a robotic humanoid designed to blend in with society.

Edit: *comes back covered in blood*

What cat? (Lolhalflifereference)

PETA will sue your soul down because of animal cruelty for beating a cat.

Flixx is always there to save me.
